articles.title: Watch: Arshdeep defends 10 off last over, Wade livid with umpire as IND beat AUS - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Replacing Deepak Chahar in the 5th T20I against Australia, Arshdeep Singh prevented Matthew Wade from finishing things off in style. | Cricket
articles.content: Arshdeep Singh's final-over masterclass saved Avesh Khan the blushes as Matthew Wade ran into a roadblock in the fifth and final T20I of the recently concluded series between Team India and Australia… [+4737 chars]

articles.title: 'Not hoping for good end': Shaheen Afridi takes no prisoners against Warner - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Pakistan pacer Shaheen Afridi has fired an early warning to Australia's retirement-bound David Warner. | Cricket
articles.content: Pakistan speedster Shaheen Shah Afridi has fired an early warning to Australia while veteran opener David Warner is gearing up for his farewell series in the longest format. Australia's leading run-g… [+2223 chars]
